profile.description: Pleased to meet you! I am Adrian Polanco, I study Software Development at Technological Institute of Las Americas (ITLA) in Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic. I am specially interested in Frontend Development.

experience.first-job-description: I got interested in software development industry, so I started to learn programming in a more committed way using platforms like Youtube and Udemy to learn Python, with which I started my path to be a software developer
experience.second-job-description: Starting from January 2023 I have been studying Software Development at Instituto Tecnológico de Las Américas(ITLA) or, translated to English: Technological Institute of Las Americas
